name: test_e2e_with_logs[141_XSS_DOM_012]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_012` |
| **Name** | DOM document.write injection |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `document.write('<script>alert(1)</script>')`
- **Encoded**: `document.write('%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C%2Fscript%3E')`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~34000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:09:24.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_DOM_012-1769861364384-tcdlfe pattern_id=XSS_DOM_012 uri=/?q=document.write('%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C%2Fscript%3E') client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_DOM_012-1769861364384-tcdlfe pattern_id=XSS_DOM_012 uri=/?q=document.write('%3Cscript%3Ealert(1)%3C%2Fscript%3E') client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
